intro: Geniostoma celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes starfruit, is a tropical plant native to Indonesia. It belongs to the family Meliaceae and is characterized by its small, star-shaped fruits that are typically yellow or green when mature. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are ovate to elliptic in shape. It produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is often used in local cuisines and has some traditional medicinal uses.
